question: What are the names of projects starting before 2022?
raw_answer: Bluffs Park Shade Structure, Birdview Avenue Improvements, Guardrail Replacement Citywide.
evidence_answer: Guardrail Replacement Citywide (FEMA Project), Birdview Avenue Improvements (CalOES Project)

Malibu Park Drainage Improvements

final paving, striping, irrigation, painting, planting material, clean-up,
and final detailing.

timber with non-combustible materials.

open, many project related items will continue. This will include
intermittent traffic control (lane closures).

the project costs.
